content: **knitted cowl in 2 strands drops air or 1 strand drops wish piece is knitted top down in stocking stitch with edges in rib and vents in each side ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ drops design pattern ai-361 yarn group c + c or e ---------------------------------------------------------- **size** s/m l/xl piece measures approx circumference at the top= 78-86 cm circumference at the bottom= 86-93 cm height = 46-50 cm **materials** drops air from garnstudio belongs to yarn group c 200-200 g colour 03 pearl grey or use drops wish from garnstudio belongs to yarn group e 200-250 g colour 03 light grey needles drops circular needle size 8 mm length 60-80 cm drops circular needle size 7 mm length 60-80 cm **knitting gauge ** 11 stitches in width and 15 row vertically in stocking stitch and 2 strands drops air or 1 strand drops wish = 10 x 10 cm note remember that needle size is only a suggestion if you have too many stitches on 10 cm switch to larger needles if you have too few stitches on 10 cm switch to smaller needles
